name: Coin War
description:
Game developed by Tomáš Jakubec, Martin Vejbora and Jan Joneš during Ludum Dare 44 Game Jam at MFF UK. The theme was Your life is currency.

You are a gold coin being spinned through an arena full of obstacles and bad brown enemy coins. Your goal is to destroy all the enemies by hitting them hard. To give your coin most energy, you have to be fast and hit it at the right spot!

The game was developed in Unity and can be downloaded for Windows or played directly in your web browser.
